message: Ana, CODE 15 skills Performance (perf01-perf15). Couvre: lazy loading, code splitting, tree shaking, minification, gzip compression, caching (browser/CDN), image optimization, critical CSS, prefetch/preload, web workers, service workers, virtual scrolling, debounce, throttle, memoization. Format: {"id": "perfXX", "type": "...", "name": "...", "description": "...", "pattern": "CODE", "example": "Explication"}.
